title: Drawing, "Virgo, Lunette for Ceiling, Sala Ottagonale, Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza", 1804–05
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and light brown wash over graphite on white laid paper
inscribed: Recto: inscribed in pen and brown ink, upper center: vergine 3 - per l'estate.   Superimposed over: vergine 8, in graphite. Squared off, in graphite, at sides from 1-4 and at bottom 1-8 with light source symbol at upper right. Verso: Keck.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Virgo, Lunette for Ceiling, Sala Ottagonale, Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza", 1804–05.
1804–05. Pen and brown ink, brush and light brown wash over graphite on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1181.
